forecast.wind: West to northwest 4 to 5, perhaps locally 6 at first, veering northerly 3 to 4 tonight, backing northwest 2 to 4 later.
forecast.sea: Moderate to rather rough, becoming slight with a low to moderate swell overnight, occasionally smooth later.
forecast.weather: Scattered showers, locally heavy in the south, gradually dying out overnight.
forecast.visibility: Good, occasionally moderate to poor at times.
